attributes.action: change school to four day week
attributes.additional_details: i would think this petition would benefit kids since we dont have enough time in the weekends to get our stuff done etc.
attributes.background: i would like the Government or Parliament to have a discussion about this petition

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Change the school week to a four day week:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
